item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 18, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Show HN: Scripton – Python IDE with built-in realtime visualizations (264 points | 97 comments)

28. The ideal candidate will be punched in the stomach (175 points | 90 comments)
